parameters.name: FirewallId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the VPC firewall.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PolicyDescription
parameters.description: The description of the traffic redirection instance.

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the traffic redirection instance.

parameters.name: PolicyType
parameters.description:
The type of the traffic redirection scenario of the VPC firewall. Valid values:

*   **fullmesh**: interconnected instances
*   **one_to_one**: instance to instance
*   **end_to_end**: instance to instances
